name: HotCraft
title: HotCraft (directly handcraft items by hotkey)
author: BinbinHfr
description: Directly handcraft items from your inventory or toolbelt by hotkey, without even browsing the recipes list: just grab a stack in your hand and use ALT-1, ALT-2 or ALT-3 to queue 1,5 or 10 more items for handcrafting.
